name: Chest
description: Pectoral muscles responsible for pushing movements.

name: Legs
description: Muscles of the lower body including quadriceps, hamstrings, and calves.

name: Back
description: Upper and middle back muscles such as the latissimus dorsi and trapezius.

name: Shoulders
description: Deltoid muscles that support arm movement and shoulder stability.

name: Arms
description: Biceps, triceps, and forearm muscles involved in lifting and pulling.

name: Core
description: Abdominal and lower back muscles that stabilize the body and maintain posture.
